author: Steven Levy
title: Facebook Could Help Journalism by Making News Easier to Find
description: The social media giant gave $100 million to help local news during the pandemic, but still makes you hunt for trusted sources.
content: Facebook announced on Monday that it was going to spend $100 million to help local news outlets during the coronavirus crisis. Its a moment where getting accurate news about the coronavirus is vital for all us, says Campbell Brown, the former television news … [+3525 chars]
